metadata.description: A collection of skills for Claude Code to enhance AI-assisted development workflows

plugins.name: summoning-the-user
plugins.description: Use when an agent encounters a blocking decision or when proceeding without user input could lead to wasted work - helps Claude determine when to block and request user input versus making reasonable assumptions

plugins.name: daily-planning-ritual
plugins.description: Interactive daily planning ritual that guides the user through a reflective conversation across all life dimensions (work, fitness, relationship, social, adventure) and produces a holistic day plan

plugins.name: writing-product-specs
plugins.description: Write comprehensive product specification documents for new features or projects that clearly communicate what we're building, why, and how we'll know it's successful

plugins.name: writing-user-stories
plugins.description: Write properly formatted user stories for task definition that identify the persona, desired action, and expected benefit

plugins.name: setting-up-a-project
plugins.description: Author CLAUDE.md with project purpose, tech stack, and development practices before scaffolding code

plugins.name: writing-verification-plans
plugins.description: Create real-world acceptance testing procedures that validate projects work in actual scenarios, never using mocks
